title: KMFDM - A Drug Against War [1993] EAC FLAC LOG
description:
KMFDM - A Drug Against War [1993] EAC FLAC LOG

A Drug Against War is a single from KMFDM's 1993 album, Angst. It contains an alternate version of "Blood", with a stronger beat and sans rhythm guitar, as well as two remixes of "A Drug Against War", the "Overdose Mix" being the same as the version on Angst but extended, and the "Hookah Mix" having a significantly slower beat.

Track listing

   1. "A Drug Against War" 3:43
   2. "A Drug Against War (Overdose Mix)" 5:28
   3. "A Drug Against War (Hookah Mix)" 3:37
   4. "Blood" 4:01
